episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4001_100:
Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my Electroweb!
Whosawhatsit? Iono!

’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour!
Today I’ve got a humongous announcement for all
my loyal fans!

Believe it or not, I’m doing a collab with Lear, the
guy in charge of the artificial island of Pasio!

Hahahaha! You’d all better be grateful for a
collab like this!

I’m having her show the world all the delights of
Pasio—a Trainer’s paradise!

Therefore, I am declaring her videos OFFICIAL
Pasio content!

Anything official gets waaay more eyeballs than
unofficial stuff...

My subscriber numbers are gonna rise like a
super-fast Eelektross crawlin’ out of the ocean!
And Pasio will become even more well-known!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4001_030:
Why are you two looking at me like
that...?
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4001_040: That’s not a very friendly thing to say, friendo.
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4001_100: Don’t talk like you’re not a part of this!

I want YOU behind the camera,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You’ve been asked plenty of times to help out
behind the scenes for events before... Shouldn’t
you be used to it by now?

Nyahaha... Bein’ able to go with the flow is a
pretty important skill, ya know?

And I ’unno about you, but I think it’s about time
we get down to filming! Whaddya say?
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/6001_100:
Now lessee... What kinda viral content can I find
here on Pasio...?

Err, I mean, what kind of precious encounters
await us?!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4002_100: It’s time for the Iono Zone, everybody!

Ladies and gentlemens!
’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour!

I’m here on Pasio—that artificial island straight
outta your dreams—where Trainers from all over
the world come together!

What kindsa people and Pokémon do ya think
we’ll find?
Whuzzat?!
...Hey, point that camera over there! THERE!
Th-there’re NINJAS on Pasio?!
We’re from Fuchsia City in Kanto, and we’re—

Say no more, Janine. Ninjas must keep to the
shadows...

They just...vanished! Huh... Those ninja skills were
the real deal!
Oh! And over there I see...

The famous masked fighters Crasher Wake and the
Masked Royal!

Is an EPIC matchup about to unfold right before my
very eyeballs?!
Crash! Crash! Crasher Wake!
Here I come, Crasher Wake! Ready...fight!

As you can see, there are a whole lotta shockingly
famous celebrities here on Pasio!

An’ some of ’em agreed to appear in my stream!
Heeere are a couple of those guests!

Famous faces of Galar! Raihan—king of rackin’ up
the likes—and the model Nessa!

Gettin’ big-time guests like these is great news for
my bank acc—

Err, I mean...a great honor for me and my dear
fans!
I’ve seen your content a lot, too!

Can I get a selfie to commemorate our
collaboration?

What a trio! This one’s gonna blow up the socials!
Grade-A pic, right here!

The buzz won’t last long if you stay satisfied with
just the two of us!
Hey, Elesa! Lisia!
Wait, next we got Unova’s fashion leader, Elesa...
and Hoenn contest idol Lisia?!

And, huh... Elesa’s outfit looks kinda different from
usual, doesn’t it?

This is a sygna suit. It’s an outfit that symbolizes
a Trainer’s bond with their Pokémon.

These special outfits are made for us by a
designer here on Pasio!

And it’s not just fashion—there are gobs of things
you can’t see anywhere but on Pasio!
Such as a photo of all of us together!

Indeedy-doo! A super-rare scene that’s definitely
a Pasio exclusive!
You gotta see this with your own two peepers!

So that’s the scoop, loyal fans! You should all
come and visit Pasio!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4003_100:
Whosawhatsit? The Iono Cooking Show!
Woooo!

I’m here with a buncha Trainers who’ve got
super-duper cooking skills. We’re gonna whip up
some amaaazingly delicious desserts!

But ya know, there are all kinds of desserts—it
just depends on the region. Like, there are desserts
for humans and desserts for Pokémon...

Right! For instance, in Hoenn we have treats for
Pokémon called Pokéblocks!
Poké Puffs are quite a popular snack in Kalos!
Malasadas are the thing in Alola!
Aaand sandwiches are popular in Paldea!

But I defer to you, Siebold! Can a sandwich be
a dessert?!

It would depend on your definition of “dessert,”
but depending on what you put in the sandwich,
I suppose you could call it a dessert.

If I whipped some reeeally sweet fresh cream into
a batch of curry, would that make it a dessert?!

Huh... I didn’t know dessert curry was even
a thing...

I’m pickin’ up what you’re puttin’ down, friendos!
Sounds like there are all sortsa different desserts
around the world!

Now then! Ready or not, let’s get these cooking
fun-times rollin’!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4004_100: Next up, we’re gonna get a little more serious...
It’s time for an academic topic!

A whole buncha expert Pokémon Professors are
are gathered here on Pasio!

So, Profs! Have you discovered anything new since
arriving on Pasio?

Hmm, I suppose we’ve discovered that Mega
Evolution and Dynamaxing are manifested
differently when using a sync stone.
So they look different in different places...
That reminds me of regional variants!

Ohhh! I expected no less from Pokémon Professors!
Lookin’ at things with a scientific eye!

If you please, I’mma ask you to give my loyal
viewers a quick lesson about regional variants!

The same Pokémon can have different
appearances depending on the region...

and sometimes different Pokémon that look alike
are classified as the same species!
We call those regional variants!
This Tauros, for example...

It looks different from the Tauros in Paldea,
doesn’t it?

Oooh, indeedy-doo! I don’t think I’ve seen a
Tauros like this with my own two eyeballs before!

It’s not just Pokémon, either! I feel like we also
change depending on the environment.

Being able to interact with professors from other
regions here on Pasio is really inspiring, after all!
That may be the biggest discovery of all for us!

Phew! That got pretty academic, huh? Let’s give
our brains a break with somethin’ less thinky!

Next, I’ll introduce y’all to some of the most
impressive scenery here on Pasio!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4005_100: Surfin’ and swimmin’ as far as the eye can seeee!
Ooh, an Alolan Raichu! Awesome! What a cutie!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4006_100: Oooh! Are they gonna pull some ultra-rare ore?!
Maybe they will—I’m a luck magnet, after all!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4007_100:
Brrr! Why aren’t you all more bundled up in this
cold?!

Dahahaha! This doesn’t even register as cold
to me!

Same! It could actually stand to be a little
chillier here!
episode_event_ch0296_00_nanjamo/4008_100:
There you have it, loyal viewers! That was Iono’s
Official Pasio Extravaganza! Did y’all have fun?!

Anybody feelin’ like—bzzzt!—you wanna come to
Pasio RIGHT NOW?! Don’t forget to subscribe!

Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my Electroweb!
Whosawhatsit? Iono...signing off!
...Or rather, I WOULD say that, but...

I’m finishin’ this with a BIG SURPRISE! Believe it or
not, somethin’ else has been goin’ on during this
live stream!

A certain somebody’s been helping me out with
this project!
Get out here, ya silly special guest!

In case you were wondering, I’m not just any old
Poké Ball! But then who am I, you ask?
I’m none other than your mate—the Ball Guy!
The official mascot of the Galar Pokémon League...

That’s what our guest hopes to be one day!
Wait, you’re tellin’ me you AREN’T official?!
Nope! Still rolling my way toward that goal!

So, uh, are you actually allowed to wear that
get-up?

Doesn’t the Galar Pokémon League have a
character who kinda looks like that? You think that
outfit’s safe? Nothing iffy about it or anything?
It’s fine! ...I think.

Nyahaha! Ball Guy actually showed up a buncha
times in my stream, but didja all notice?

’Cause that’s the surprise! We’re gonna play
“Where in Pasio Is Ball Guy?”!

The instant I saw them, the idea came to me in
a flash, like a—bzzzt!—lightbulb!

We want you to count how many times I appeared
in Iono’s video!

If you spotted ’em every time, you’re really EXTRA
amazeballs!

And if you’re THAT incredible, maybe you could
even collab with ME someday soon!
And I might just roll up to visit you too!

Getting to meet the real Ball Guy would be a real
premium prize!
...Would it, though?

Eh, whatevs! Anyway, I’m gonna leave today’s
stream in the archive for a bit, so...

Where did Ball Guy appear? Open those eyes
wide like a Magnemite and get to searchin’!

Check out the video as many times as you need
till you figure it out!

This time I’mma wrap things up for realsies!
Reeeady?
Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my Electroweb!

Whosawhatsit? Iono the Supercharged Streamer!
Aaannnd...
Ball Guy too! Have a ball out there!
Laterz!
